body_html:
I just realised that the issue is not solved with just checking if there 'are' teams.
See this comment: The teams are present in the database. They are not in the dropdown, because we are 'between seasons' (= between two Summers of Code).

And in a later comment, the proposed solution is to show the teams from the previous season, instead of hiding the button: #934 (comment)

So, there are two situations:

  1. During the current season, the dropdown is populated with the teams that are accepted in current season.
  2. Before the current season starts, the dropdown is populated with the teams that were accepted in the previous season.

Let me know if you need help!!

See this comment:  The teams are present in the database. They are not in the dropdown, because we are 'between seasons' (= between two Summers of Code).
And in a later comment, the proposed solution is to show the teams from the previous season, instead of hiding the button: #934 (comment)
So, there are two situations:

During the current season, the dropdown is populated with the teams that are accepted in current season.
Before the current season starts, the dropdown is populated with the teams that were accepted in the previous season.

Let me know if you need help!!
body:
I just realised that the issue is not solved with just checking if there 'are' teams. 
See this [comment:](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/934#issuecomment-364842498)  The teams are present in the database. They are not in the dropdown, because we are 'between seasons' (= between two Summers of Code). 

And in a later comment, the proposed solution is to show the teams from the previous season, instead of hiding the button: https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/934#issuecomment-364868821

So, there are two situations:
1) During the current season, the dropdown is populated with the teams that are `accepted` `in current season`.
2) Before the current season starts, the dropdown is populated with the teams that were `accepted` in the previous season. 

Let me know if you need help!!
